page.title: 07Industry in Sellindge 1985
page.content: Situated off Swan Lane,about a mile from the main A20 road is "Birch's Yard".This lies in a hollow near Gibbins Brook and is a sprawling collection of buildings and workshops owned by Mr.Les Birch,a local landowner and farmer.Many of these buildings are given over to use by small businesses each employing a small number of people.These companies are engaged in servicing of cars and agricultural machinery,vehicle body repair welding, pattern making,metal spinning,haulage, civil engineering and plant hire and they constitute the only source of light or heavy industry within this village. The yard is also used by Mr.Birch for the storing of vintage traction engines which he has restored to full working order.
